1.content: Now where are we in this area?
1.title: To begin

choices: Staff (such as a janitor or clerk)
11.title: University

choices: Top Brass (such as a dean, the president, or department head)
111.content: Now who are you this time?
111.title: Head Faculty

1112.content:
Who are you once more?

Jubilee Darrieux
In-coming teacher of the new French language department, Jubilee has gotten a reputation as being the sunniest woman ever known in recent memory. She's optimistic, she bright, she possess a sharp wit. What's else can be said about the woman, well, she does have a knack for finding herself in places she isn't supposed to be. That isn't going to be a problem...right?

Coach Ava L. Laurence
Head of the school's woman's soccer league, Ava is a gruff whistle-blower. Third daughter of the town's largest meatpacking facility owner, Ava's suffers a stigma that her position was caused by nepotism. Make no mistake though, she runs a tight ship on her team.
1112.title: Teacher

1121.content:
Maya Kammie
Born and having lived her entire life in Great Tracts, Maya has gotten used to the various different sizes and bodies of people within the city as well as the various problems that some people can have due to differences in size or weight. Already standing pretty tall at 9 feet and only growing, Maya has done some growing already due to her house being very close to a chemical plant, but she is taking her slow growth in stride rather than freaking out about it.

Joy Heather
A rather minuscule woman standing at a mere 3'0", Joy Heather is one of the shortest women to enroll within Great Tracts University, taking a major in cooking. Enjoying the growth in others, Joy has been studying the growth of others so she could try in learning how she can make others grow from simply using meals, so she can have all the enjoyment in watching others grow, while also trying to figure out a way to reverse said growth in case someone would get... too big.
1121.title: Freshmen

1123.content: What about Junior or Senior?
1123.title: Other Age

11231.content:
The Carter Twins
Currently attending "exquisitely contained" classes,the Carter Twins were known troublemakers of the school. Playing pranks on others and being a genuine hassle. The three main reasons that they were never expelled were:
1. They had pretty good grades.
2.Their father is the mayor's secretary
3.They've never been officially caught.
Something did seemed to have happened over the summer though and the Carter Twins seemed changed. What with wearing very baggy clothing at all times now. Their names are Jenna and Molly; one dyes her hair blonde while the other still has her natural raven locks.

Sharon Whit
A STEM student, Sharon's current endeavor is investigating the town's strange people. She feels she's on the precipice of discovery though she may soon come across more than she bargained for in that regards. She's farsighted and so most of the time her glasses sit on the top of her mousy brown hair. She favors sweaters and skirts mashups for her usual attire.
11231.title: Junior

12.content:
The town as previously stated is a perfect blend of cool forests and nice river beaches, a perfect place to start raising a family if you want them to become nice people in the future. But where in this peaceful yet strange little town do we want to start off in?

Hospital: the towns only medical practice that is fully equipped to help deal and possibly treat some of the weird mishaps that tend to happen to people.

Evergreen Forest: one of the calmest and most beautiful forests in the entire region and their calming atmosphere make it a perfect camp grounds and hiking destinations. However, they say strange things happen within these woods.

Restaurant District: This single district contains a number of restaurants that seem to always be a hotspot with strange activity such as a food item gone bad or a dish causing something strange within its patron, either way, no one can really stay away from these places for long.

Chemical Plant: A defunct chemical plant that used to be the heart of this town till it shut down. While no one goes there, the chemicals inside still remain and sometimes leak out.

And many more places such as these.
12.title: Town

121.content: Now who do we follow?
121.title: Hospital

1213.content:
Alright, now who is our patient here?

Carla Wickman
The owner of the town's fitness center, Carla is a sporty tomboy who'll do what she can to whip others into shape. Normally, the staff of the hospital would only be seeing her teaching fitness classes, but today she's in as a patient with a very odd problem: she woke up this morning to discover her breasts had grown dramatically, and she's now having serious back pain because of it.

Toby Hadley
One of the town's mechanics, Toby is an absolutely expert in all things car. If it's engine trouble, brake issues, or problems with the wheels, Toby's the guy to talk to. So why's he here? He hit his thumb with a hammer... and instead of bleeding, the thumb went completely flat.
1213.title: Patient

122.content:
Michael Marrow
A camp guide to the Evergreen Forest, Michael Marrow has learned all about the various different kinds of wildlife within the Evergreen Forest, giving him careful knowledge on how to survive within the forest. He gives out tours throughout the summer to people who wish to explore nature, but he is not in charge of any changes caused by the Forest. He stands out at 6’0” and has dark brown hair.

Bella Belle
A rather bizarre woman with long green hair who lives at the very center of the Evergreen Forest, living among nature and only rarely comes out to the main city to occasionally stock up on food. She claims to be a nature spirit, but aside from flowers blooming wherever she walks, nobody has been able to approve or deny this. She has a vested interest in protecting the Forest, but thanks to the weird nature of the Forest her body is prone to changing in size constantly, from being a giant to being merely a foot tall.
122.title: Evergreen Forest

choices: "Sorry, can't. Too busy cleaning the forest..."
Something interrupts Bella before she can answer.
1222.content:
In the outskirts of the city of Great Tracts lies the Evergreen Forest, a expanse of wildlife and trees that has been used for camping destinations by people all across the city. However, despite the niceness of the woods, contamination from both the common tourist leaving garbage as well as the abandoned chemical plants has warped the wildlife within, giving them weird properties that can change the bodies of those who enter if they are not careful.

Normally, because of this, most people do not choose to live in these woods. However, in the center of these woods lives a certain woman, all by her lonesome...

"Hmph... another human has left trash in these woods... why do I have to always clean it up..."

Picking up another plastic bottle would be a green-haired woman with pointed ears by the name of Bella Belle, who at the time was only standing at a mere 1'0", requiring her to use both hands to carry it above her head. She had found her size to wildly fluctuate over time, and as of now she was was on the shorter end of her usual size, which she did not prefer due to it making her job harder.

"It's days like this that make me wish I had direct control over my size..."

Slowly carrying the plastic bottle out of the depths of the forest, Bella would eventually climb up a bench in order to reach a garbage can, before throwing in the bottle and watching it land in the garbage can. As she would hop back onto the ground though, the woman would hear a ringing from her phone, and as the woman would pull it out, she would check out who was calling.

"Hey It's Bella, what do you want?"

"Yo Bella, it's me Trisha! Wanted to ask if you wanted to come with me to the public pool with me today, They're offering a discount today and I thought you could relief some stress by swimming..."

Upon realizing who was on the other end, Bella would sigh heavily as she thought about Trisha. She was one of her few friends outside of the Evergreen Forest, but she seemed to stay consistently at a 7'0" height while she herself has changed in height with every visit. However, she had never really shown up below 5 feet to Trisha, which worried her a bit on what she would think if she saw her that small.

"So, you coming or no?"
1222.title: Bella Belle

125.content:
Blue Hills Cemetery and Morgue-One of the spookiest and most morbid place in the town. Blue Hills is around seventy-five acres of land for those dearly departed. Blues Hills Morgue also contains a small stone mason hut for on premises grave markers.

Harriet's Hairdressers-The place for all things hair. Started by Marry Harriet, her great-granddaughter Merry Harriet and her brother Greg Harriet now run the store. Fourteen dressers,stylists,and barbers work 10 to 6; 5 out of 7.
125.title: More places

1251.content:
Tina White: The White family has owned the Blue Hills for generation and it has now fallen to Tina, the current matriarch.She intentionally takes a goth look to her since she thinks it's appropriate for her job, but is still a warm and friendly person.

General Age:32


Jacquelin "Jack" Hawksly. An only child, Jack was always a tomboy growing up. She was in most school sports, gained a love of comics and video games, and went to Great Tracts with intentions of being a engineer.

And for God's knows what reason,ended up as the stonemason for gravemarkers.

Though what many people don't know is her body's very...flexible to put it bluntly.

General Age:28
1251.title: Blue Hills Cemetery and Morgue

choices: Jack gets back to her stonemasonry
12512.content:
"Who brought these flowers here?" Jack asked in annoyance. She stayed fifteen feet away from the mix of daffodils and daisies.Shane looked over at the cemetary's stone mason with half-lidded eyes.

"Oh yeah, forgot you're allergic to them, hang on." He spoke. With a few quick steps, the small man picked the flowers up from the front desk and put them into the back room. He came back and dusted his hands off.

"Why don't you wear a mask?" Shane questioned Jack as she hesitantly came over. She kept a hand over her mouth and nose for a few moments until she knew she was okay.

"Then nobody can see my winning smile." She joked. "Anyways Shane, I got the Gilligan's angel out in shop. Get the 'three stooges' to lift it over to them."

"You know they hate that name."

"And are they here right now? No. Then they never heard me use right now."

Shane gave her a half-grin and opened his palm up, with that action, Jack handed over a slip. Shane placed it into a box marked 'to the boss' right before he handed an envelope to Jack.

"You know the drill. Pictures of what they want and other parameters are in it." Shane waved her off as Jack walked back to her quarters.

She looked around for a few moments before she stretched her arm out like a hookline and grabbed a hold of a nearby fence post. With a soft 'whee' from her mouth, Jack shot forward like a bullet.

She landed with a thud she landed on the soft grass, barely feeling a thing, Jack lengthed her legs to run forth back to her section.

The tomboy was never born with these powers, an accident involving some tainted coke had given Jack the ability to stretch like Mr.Fantastic. It also aggravated her already existing allergies to the extreme. After this accident Jhad thought she was a freak,but she soon encountered others. Great Tract's seemingly kept its population of weirdos on the downlow,even though two-thirds of the younger folk in town suffered great life-changing conditions.

"Heck my two best friends have a rack that a supermodel would envy and the inflates like a sponge when she hits water." Jack mused.
12512.title: Jacquelin "Jack" Hawksly

125121.content:
Returning to her workshop, or as she liked to call it the "quarry", Jack sat at her main desk and opened the envelope with her next order on it.

The pictures in the envelope showed a slate of marble and a sketch of an open book. Behind them was a note with what the customer wanted the epitaph to say. The note read: "Martin Albert Windlemon. Beloved Grandfather and Librarian. June 7th, 1944 - August 8th, 2020."

"Rest in Piece, Marty." Jack said to herself. "Whole town's gonna miss ya."

Setting the pictures and note down, Jack went over to what she liked to call her "mine", the storage area where she kept stones that would soon be shaped into headstones.

Stonemasonry hadn't been Jack's first choice of job. She had wanted to be an engineer, but took multiple classes to cover her bases in case that didn't work. Sure enough, it didn't. Jack's stonemasonry classes, though, came into use when the original Stonemason of Blue Hills Cemetery retired. And thus, here she was.

Her rubber powers actually were quite helpful here too. Stretching her arms, she wrapped them around a large piece of marble, and lifted with all her might. She was slightly stronger, but not by much. Lugging the piece of rock out of the "mine", Jack set in on her reinforced work station, grabbed her chisel, made her hand grow large, and got to work on shaping the stone.

She got about part way through when she heard the door to her workshop open. She was about to shrink her hand down until she heard a voice.

"Hey Jack! You in here?" The voice yelled. A voice belonging to one of the only two people who knew about Jack's secret power. That person was...
125121.title: Worktime

choices: Yuki and Jack talk for awhile
Someone absentmindedly walks in on their meeting.
1251211.content:
Yuki.

She would've been quite a petite Japanese woman, if one didn't count the bazongas on her chest. They took up the entire view of her chest and if she was any shorter, than she'd would've been quite reminiscent of a certain anime character.

The woman used to keep her hair in almost flowing locks, but she seemed to cut it quite short this month. It was done in a generic, Japanese bob-cut. A melon pin was tied in her hair, either out of irony or general love of the fruit.

"Ciao~ Jackie!" Yuki called out. Jack stretched out her hand to give her friend a handshake. Her boobs jiggled in enthusiastic shaking.
------

Yuki was another of the town's weirdos that somehow stayed hidden away from public eye. The stonemason had discovered the woman one lonely night, which in turn allowed Jack to discover she wasn't freak in town.

Yuki's story was quite different than Jack's though. Working for Mrs.Abernathy, the town's largest--in more ways than one--debutante,Yuki felt a subtle envy for the other workers there. Who seemed to also suffer the town's weird affliction. Yuki,being the only normal person there,decided to join the in-crowd.

"I only wanted them to get a smidge bigger." Yuki told the stretcher.

Finding a doctor who wasn't a few days drive out of town, Yuki expected him to give her bust a nice boob job. Instead, she received knockers half her size. She of course complained to the man, who told her she needed the funds for their removal. Already out of cash for the first operation, Yuki did her best to scrounge up more for her second.
-------

"I don't think that's hello." Jack told the Japanese woman.

"I think it is." Yuki replied with a slight shrug. The woman still kept her sunny attitude despite the fact her back regularly suffered soreness or the fact she needed to do all of her shopping at specialty stores,at night.
1251211.title: ...Yuki.

choices: "...my mother's coming to visit, and I need moral support."
"...I found a manga you might like."
12512111.content:
"So, how's the money savin' going?" Jack asked as she began picking away at the marble again.

"Slow." Yuki replied. "But I'm getting there. Though at the rate I'm going, I'll probably be stuck with these monsters for life. It'd be so nice to be out in public again."

"Yeah, I'd love to show off my powers in public, but I get the feeling people would freak." Jack replied. "You'd think all these changes would be more out in the open, but nope.

Yuki shrugged, and pulled her cell phone out of her cleavage. "Well, at least I have some extra carrying space." She said.

Jack looked back at Yuki. Yuki's massive bust filled up her entire lap when sitting, and came up to her chin. Though heavy, they kept a perfectly round shape thanks to the implants. While she knew Yuki's issues with them, Jack did love the sight.

Jack had gained a love of huge breasts in college. She had no interest in sex or romance at all, but there was just something about giant boobs she liked. In her off-time, she browsed the internet for stories of huge breasts.

"Anyway, that's not why I came here." Yuki said. "I actually wanted to see if you wanted to come over to my house after work."

"What for?" Jack asked, turning back to the stone.

Yuki smiled. "Well..."
12512111.title: A Friendly Chat

choices: Things go to more personal topics.
Jack finishes what she can for the day before she hides
125121111.content:
"...it's "Shitty Movie" Night."

Jack head did a 180 as she worked on her piece of stone.

"Tonight? Really?" She asked. Meanwhile her hands searched the workshop for her tools. With the advent of her powers, Jack had significantly changed how she decorated anywhere she lived or worked. Tools could be grabbed with barely any mishaps,either they were attached to easily openable locks or just laying in neat molds.

"Yep. I've invited Jess as well as Miranda and Kim and Scotty." Yuki said,she stretched a little,which showed off her great big boobs. "Damn back."

Her breasts were actually lighter than one would've expected, though physics still took a hold on Yuki's small frame. The Japanese woman scratched a little at her side. Jack grimaced in empathy.

"I barely know those last three." Jack spoke. "What's their deal?"

"Well Miranda's somewhat taller than most girls." Yuki shuffled a bit to make her sore back feel better. "Kim's quite...big headed. And well Scotty's suffers anger issues."

Jack internalized each of Yuki's words. "Wait, how does that.."

"You'll see at the meeting." Yuki interrupted her friend's question.
125121111.title: Shitty Movie Night, tonight

choices: ...only Jess, the others hadn't arrived yet.
1251211112.content:
"Well, I'd better get home. I think you have a tombstone to finish, and I gotta get ready for tonight. I've got some real shitty films for us to watch. See you tonight." Yuki said. With that, she turned and walked out of Jack's workstations, her boobs bouncing the whole time.

Jack smiled, before turning back to the tombstone. She'd gotten part of it finished, and she hoped to have at least half of it done before she had to leave. Thankfully, since she had a policy that she needed at least a week to finish a tombstone, she had plenty of time. So, she got back to work, chipping away at the stone.
---------
After a few hours, Jack had indeed managed to get half of the stone shaped into an open book, but it was time to close shop. Setting her tools aside, she left her workshop and locked it. Looking around to make sure no one was watching, she stretched her arm like a grapple, latched onto a nearby tree, and took off.

It only took Jack a few minutes to reach Yuki's house, bounding across the rooftops. Thankfully, she managed to avoid other people. Landing right in front of Yuki's door, she was about to knock before it swung open. Yuki was on the other side.

"Rooftops again?" Yuki asked. "Someone's going to see you eventually, you know."

"Not the route I take." Jack said. She looked behind Yuki into her living room, and saw...
1251211112.title: Ending the Work Day

choices: Yuki tells the girl the movie.
12512111122.content:
Jess who was sitting down on the couch. Underneath her shirt and pants was her signature wetsuit. It was a full body shield against most liquids.

The covered woman got up and walked over to Jack with a small smile. She overshadowed the girl by about six inches in height.

"Jacq-Lin, pleasant to see you again." Her almost siren-like voice spoke. If she was attracted to women, Jack would've taken the voice right at that moment.

"You to Jess. We've each other in forever."

"It's only been two days." Jess replied. Her head did that weird bob that Jack teased her about. Yuki hastily pushed Jack inside and closed the door.

"So what's with the suit? Its not going to rain until Sunday." Jack questioned Jess as they walked over to the couch.

"You never know, Jacq-Lin, you never know." Jess replied. Her hands fidgeted together.

----

Jess' story was tragic,well not too melancholic anyways. Once a lover of the town's lakes, something scratched the woman's thigh when she was eighteen years old. Which showed its effects far too quickly for her liking. It was only through a large tide did she managed to get back to shore. Naked mind you, but at least she wasn't growing until she'd explode.

Packing up her things, the once water faring lass moved into her late Uncle's cabin to escape from any large bodies of water.
12512111122.title: Only Jess is here.

125121111222.content:
Jack and Jess were sitting on the couch, while Yuki was sitting in a recliner made specifically to fit her bust. In her hand was a DVD.
"OK, this movie's gotten review scores that can be counted in the single digits." Yuki said. "It's called 'Night of the Buxom Demons'."

"Where the hell'd you find a movie called that?" Jess asked.

"Thrift store. Saw the title and knew it'd be up Jack's alley." Yuki teased.

"Haha." Jack replied. "So, what's the deal with the film?"

"It's about a witch who makes a deal with a really busty succubus to get revenge on her ex-boyfriend. The succubus turns most of the towns women into huge-boobed, brainwashed minions, and now the ex-boyfriend has to work with his current girlfriend to stop all this." Yuki explained.

"Who comes up with this crap?" Jack asked. "What makes the movie shit? That is the whole point of tonight."

"Oh, you have no idea." Yuki replied. "Awful acting, ugly set designs, plot holes you can drive a submarine through, and characters dumber then hammers. Only thing it has going for it are the boob effects."

"Sounds horrible!" Jess said. "This'll be fun!"

Jack was just about to reply when she heard the doorbell ring. Yuki got up to see who it was. On the other side of the door was...
125121111222.title: Night of the Buxom Demons

choices: Larry's Hybrid Drive-Thru Movie and Sit-in Theater
1253.content:
Farshine District:
Contains the Great Tract's High School, suburbs, and stadium.

Larry's Hybrid Drive-thru movie and sit-in theater!
Exactly what it says, it's been a town staple since the 60's.
1253.title: Other Places III

12531.content:
Lannie Mckinnely-
Age:21
A rather reclusive woman, Lannie is known around her suburb as "the kooky lady whose somewhat nice." No matter the weather,she keeps herself dressed under several layers of clothing. Many have noted how hot it must be under there, but none have said anything to her face yet.

Sharon Tate:
Age:22
The local recreational manager, Sharon is known to be quite friendly and very health conscious. One thing to note is her prescribed pills she takes after every meal,no one knows their purpose.
12531.title: Farshine District

info.brief_description: A perfect place for lads and ladies of all sizes
info.description:
What can be said of Great Tracts? The university is considered the highest class of the entire region, while the town is considered the most perfect blend of cool forests and calm river beaches. With a population of over two-hundred thousand, and with a rising populace to boot, it seems that town's popularity is ever on the rise. But there have been some concerns with the town's populace. Like how two-thirds of anybody ages seventeen to thirty-two have suffered some minor physical mishaps. Maybe its something in the water, or the air, maybe its the science building acting up, or maybe its that old chemical plant leaking into the fields. Whatever the case, its not that bad...right?

Rules:

Fetishes(If it's not on the list, do not add):
1.All types of expansion/inflation(that includes Fruits in the mix)
1a. On Giant(ess), their size should never exceed one-hundred feet. On berries, the size in both diameter or height should never exceed fifty feet. On inflation, whether they be air or water or what else, the size should never exceed eighty feet.
1b. Multiple fetishes can be mashed together.

2.Shrinkage.
2a. The size should never go below five inches in height.

3. Bendies, or more accurately, flattening or stretchable bodies. Mr. Fantastic or flatman and the like.
3a. Lengths should never exceed three-hundred feet if they're rubber men/women.

4.Balloon girls/guys or anthropomorphic pool toys.

5.Hose stuffing, force feeding,absorption, and all other types of mouth filling.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Both Ladies and Lads can expand in this interactive.
Nudity is a-okay. Don't be too graphic in that though.
Methods of expansion, whether they be from sight, or sound, or even allergies, doesn't matter.
Expansion* is permanent in all cases except: Breast Expansion, Berrisim, and Ballooning.
A. Breast Expansion should only cut down ten inches all around every milking session.
B. Berrisim should always shrink an afflicted down, unless stated otherwise. It should also lead towards permanent flexibility.
C. Ballooning does/does not lead to flattening, depending on the writer's preference.
Spelling and grammar should both be at an acceptable level of comprehension.
A chapter should have at least 1100 in characters.
*That are not triggered-as in from allergies or sight or sound,etc.

EDIT: 9/15/20
Bendies can now be over 500ft in length.
Weight Gain men and women can't be over 3,000 pounds.
Maximum Age is now 35 Years Old.
Giantess can now be over 200 ft in height.
Shrinking can be under 3 inches in height.
